title: Improve Weekend Operations
description: Weekend enrollments are only 64% of weekday levels. Consider extended hours or awareness campaigns.

title: Implement Demand Smoothing
description: High daily variation (CV=127%) indicates unpredictable demand. Consider appointment systems.
